message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this exceptional product with you. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a high-value item that I'm confident you'll find valuable. I'm willing to start the conversation with an offer of $1000000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're selling. My counteroffer would be $750000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I'm getting a good return on my investment.
I understand your perspective, Alice. Given the current market conditions and the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $850000.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $900000 and $850000, so I'll propose $875000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market conditions.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering our previous discussions and the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $860000.

I'm glad we're close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $875000, but I'm not going any lower. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the time we've invested in this negotiation. Let's see if we can finalize the deal at this price.
I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $865000.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $875000, Bob. I've already made significant concessions, and I believe this is a fair price for the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway between $875000 and $865000, so I'll propose $870000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
After reviewing all the offers, I am willing to pay $867500 for the product.
